title: Super Galaxy Kindred Skin Bug
body:
Hi i wanted to report a Bug with the Super Galaxy Kindred skin.
If she marks a Champion and that Champion sees her on the Map then the game freezes for 2sec for that Player with the Mark on it.
Other Players are not effected aslong the Kindred Mark is not on them but if there Marked it happens overall 4 times till the Game doesn't freeze anymore even though your Marked from her.
I can't say it happens all the time since i only played against a Kindred with that skin once but even for my Premade and teammates froze the game after they got marked and saw Kindred on the Minimap

replies.body:
Hey Yasutsuna! 

Thanks for taking the time to report this! Looks like from what you're describing, this is occurring when you have an enemy Super Galaxy Kindred in the game. I think you may be correct that this is something occurring due to FoW, or a particle pre-loading issue. I can follow up on this today and see what may be causing this. :)

Would be nice if you could do that. 
Saw that bug happen today too but on Voyboy's stream the enemy Super Galaxy Kindred marked him came out of FoW he froze and then died because of it. 
I could add a Vod from his stream if it would help but overall would be nice if that skin gets disabled until its fixed :)

No need for the video, but I appreciate it. :) Unlike the Dark Star Thresh bug, this isn't affecting all users from our findings, seems to only be occurring with particular graphics cards; we're still looking into the issue. At this time, we aren't planning on disabling this skin.

Ok then but i hope you guys can fix it somehow.
but its actually interesting that a bug occurs with particular graphic cards did something like that happen before ?
We've had issues that have only been due to particular graphics cards, yes.

Perhaps the underlying cause is similar to the bug with Dark Star Thresh?

https://i.imgur.com/1HvNiEO.png?noredirect
Nope - Thresh was something a bit different. D:
so uh any news about the fix ? because it still happends and its kinda annoying that happends for the complete team and not a single person anymore if she comes out from FoW for the first time.

We're in the process of verifying a fix for this. If the fix is verified, we work to get it in the next patch. (Sorry this has taken so long, but like larger issues, we do want to make sure the fix works, but we also want to make sure nothing else breaks in the process.)
